org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.groovy.jsr223.dsl.credential

Class CredentialGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.groovy.jsr223.dsl.credential.CredentialGraph

  • public class CredentialGraph
extends Object
    A DSL for managing a "credentials graph" used by Gremlin Server for simple authentication functions. If the Graph is transactional, new transactions will be started for each method call.
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)

    • Method Detail

      • findUser

        public Vertex findUser(String username)
        Finds a user by username and return null if one could not be found.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is more than one user with a particular username.

      • createUser

        public Vertex createUser(String username,
                         String password)
        Creates a new user.
        Returns:
        the newly created user vertex

      • removeUser

        public long removeUser(String username)
        Removes a user by name.
        Returns:
        the number of users removed (which should be one or zero)

      • countUsers

        Get a count of the number of users in the database.
